src_text: Maemo Renang.
tgt_text: Ezisematheni.

src_text: Eneji.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Kabinete etse hloko tswelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Tshebetso ya Eneji, ha ntse amohela hore ho na le ditshitiso tse ntseng di le teng kgahlanong le marangrang naha..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyiphawulile inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ekuqalisweni koHlelo Lwezamandla, kanti liyazibona izingqinamba ezilokhu zikhona eziphazamisa isizinda sikagesi sikazwelonke.

src_text: Ha naha kena nakong ya Mariha, Kabinete amohetse phethelo ya Konteraka bakeng sa di-megawatts tse 400 (MW) tsa bokgoni bo ekeditsweng ka Standard Offer Programme tla ba inthaneteng pele ho mafelo Motsheanong.

tgt_text: Njengoba izwe lingena esikhathini saseBusika, iKhabhinethi lamukele ukuphothulwa kweNkontileka yama-400 megawatts (MW) kagesi owengeziwe ngohlelo lwe-Standard Offer Programme oluzotholakala ngobuchwepheshe ngaphambi kokuphela kukaNhlaba wezi-.

src_text: Ho feta moo, Lefapha la Bophelo bo botle le kgethile dipetlele tse 213 hore di se angwe ke ho kgaoha ha motlakase, ho tsona tse 76 di se di ntse di qheletswe ka thoko mme lefapha le sebeletsa hore le eketse dipetlele tse ding tse 46 ha boemo bo se bo hatetse pele..

Kabinete amohela hape ho thakgolwa ho atametseng ha Energy One-Stop Shop ka la 31 Motsheanong 2023 ke Invest SA ho potlakisa mekgwa ya taolo tla thusa dikhampani tse ntjha tse fehlang matla hore le tsona di nke karolo etse hloko tswelopele entsweng Seteisheneng se Fehlang Matla sa Kusile ho tsosolosa 3 200 MW, yuniting ya 1, 2, 3 le ya 5, ho marangrang naha qetellong ya..
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, uMnyango Wezempilo usukhombe izibhedlela ezingama-213 okufanele zingacinyelwa ugesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, ezingama-76 zazo esezivele zingacinyelwa nosekuzokwengezwa ezinye izibhedlela ezingama-46 ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi.

src_text: Kabinete tshwenyehile ka tswelopele ya phatlalatso ya ditaba tsa bohata, ho pharalla le metjha ya ditaba ya setjhaba bolelang ka katamelo ya ho putlama ha marangrang naha leng se tla baka ho tima ha motlakase ka ho felletseng.
Eskom tiiseditse mmuso ka merero keneng tshebetsong bakeng sa ditshireletso tsa tsamaiso ho thibela ho tima ha motlakase ka ho felletseng naheng yohle.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lamukela ukwethulwa osekusemome kwe-Energy One-Stop Shop mhla wama-31 kuNhlaba 2023 ye-Invest SA okuhloswe ngako ukusheshisa izinqubo zokulawula ezizosiza izinkampani ezintsha eziphehla ugesi ukuthi nazo zibe yingxenye..

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa hape ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa hore ba tswele pele ho boloka motlakase.
tgt_text: Liphawule inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe eSiteshini Sikagesi iKusile yokubuyisa ugesi oyizi-3 200 MW, kumayunithi 1, 2, 3 no-5 kwisizinda sikazwelonke uma kuphela owezi-..

src_text: Morero ke ho boloka bonyane 1 000 MW ka letsatsi leng se lekanang le ho boloka mohato wa pele wa ho kgaoha ha motlakase letsatsi ka leng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhathazekile ngezindaba ezingamampunge ezilokhu ziqhubeka zizungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zokuthi maduze-nje isizinda sikagesi sikazwelonke sizowa lokho okuzoholela ebumnyameni ezweni lonke.

src_text: Letona la Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa tla tsebisa naha ka dintlha tsa moraorao tsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Tshebetso ya Eneji ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023, puisanong ya boraditaba.
tgt_text: U-Eskom uqinisekise uhulumeni ngezinhlelo ezibekiwe zokuvikela uhlelo lokusebenza lokugwema ubumnyama kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Bophelo bo Botle.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyaphinda licela bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqhubeke nokonga ugesi.

src_text: Mmuso thehile komiti sebetsang ya setekgeniki etellwang pele ke Lefapha la Naha la Bophelo bo Botle, ho arabela seweng sa kholera Hammanskraal Toropong ya Tshwane seng bolaile batho ba 15 ho tloha ka la 24 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Okuhlosiwe ukonga okungenani i-1 000 MW nsuku zonke, okulingana nokonga isigaba esisodwa sokucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga usuku ngalunye.

src_text: Ho etswa mosebetsi moholo wa ho lekola mehlodi yohle ka bang teng ya tshilafalo bang ke mehlodi ya metsi, ditanka tse tsamaisang metsi, dipompo le Tshebetso ya ho Hlwekisa Metsi Ditshila ya Rooiwal (WWTW).
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezogesi, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uzokwazisa izwe ngokuqaliswa koHlelo Lwezamandla ngoLwesihlanu, mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023, esithangamini sabezindaba..

src_text: Ho fihlela jwale, ha ho na bopaki ba ho fumanwa ha baktheria ya kholera mehloding ena leng se re kgodisang hore ho ka etsahala ebe kholera bile ketsahalo ya nako le nngwe feela ya tshilafalo, ka ditshwaetso tsa hajwale tseo ka nna ya ba di bakilwe ke ba tshwaeditsweng mme le bona ba tshwaetsa ba bang.
tgt_text: Ezempilo.

src_text: Ha mesebetsi ena ntse tswela pele, baahi ba Hammanskraal ba kgothaletswa hore ba bedise metsi pompo mme ba tshele letswai le seng le kae pele ba nwa.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usesungule ikomidi lezobuchwepheshe, eliholwa nguMnyango Kazwelonke Wezempilo, njengendlela yokubhekana nokubheduka kwesifo sohudo e-Hammanskraal eDolobheni lase-Tshwane, esesithathe impilo yabantu abayi-15 ngomhla wama-24 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Ho phaella moo, mang kapa mang ya nang le letshollo, ho nyekelwa ke pelo kapa matshwao tshebetso ya mala lokela ho potlakela ngakeng kapa tleliniking ya lehae.

Letona la Metsi le Bohlweki, Monghadi Senzo Mchunu tla kopana le Ramotse wa Toropo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023 boitekong ba ho theha moralo kopanetsweng wa ntjhafatso seng siilwe ke nako ya Rooiwal WWTW..
tgt_text: Umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka wokuhlolisisa yonke imisuka yokungcola, okungaba imithombo yamanzi, izimoto ezihambisa amanzi, izimpompi kanye nesihlanzimanzi i-Rooiwal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).

src_text: Bakeng sa dintlha tse ding ka letsetsa mohala wa mahala sebetsang bosiu le motsheare wa Setsi sa Naha sa Mafu Tshwaetsanang (NICD) ho 082 883.
tgt_text: Kuze kube yimanje, abukho ubufakazi begciwane lesifo sohudo osebutholakele kule mithombo yamanzi, lokho okuqinisa ukuthi kungenzeka ukubheduka kwesifo sohudo kwasuka esigamekweni esisodwa sokungcola kwamanzi, njengoba izigameko zamanje zingenxa yokungcola okusuka kumuntu kuye komunye.

src_text: Tataiso ya phekolo ya Kholera inthaneteng ho www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Njengoba kuqaliswa izindlela zokungenelela, abahlali base-Hammanskraal bayagqugquzelwa ukuthi babilise amanzi empompi futhi bafake ingcosana kasawoti ngaphambi kokuwaphuza.

src_text: Patlisiso ya Kotara ya Basebetsi (QLFS).
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, noma ngubani ohanjiswa yisisu, ukucanuzela kwenhliziyo noma izimpawu zokuphathwa isisu kufanele avakashele udokotela wakhe ngokushesha noma umtholampilo wendawo..

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse hore QLFS ya pele ya 2023 bontshitse keketseho ya botshelela ya kotara ka tatellano ho dipalo tsa mesebetsi le khiro ya batho ba dimilione tse.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle, uMnu Senzo Mchunu, uzohlangana noSodolobha weDolobha lase-Tshwane u-Cllr Cilliers Brink, ngoLwesihlanu mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023 emzamweni wokuqhamuka nesu elihlanganyelwe lokulungiswa osekudlulelwe isikhathi kwe-Rooiwal WWTW..

src_text: 2 haufi haholo le ho fihla khiro ha batho ba dimilione tse.
tgt_text: Ngemininingwane ethe xaxa ungashayela inombolo ephuthumayo esebenza ubusuku nemini yeSikhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithelelanayo (i-NICD) ku-082 883.

src_text: 4 pele ho matsatsi Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Imihlahlandlela yokwelashwa kwesifo sohudo itholakala ngobuchwepheshe ku-www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: Sena ke pontsho hlakileng ya hore moruo wa Afrika Borwa ntlafala ka matla ka mora ho angwa ke sewa sena..
tgt_text: UCwaningo Lwekota Lwabasebenzi (i-QLFS).

src_text: Kotara ya pele ya dipalopalo tsa khiro di bontsha hore ke mesebetsi 209 000 thehilweng tlasa taolo ya mmuso mme 107 000 seng tlasa taolo ya mmuso nakong ya kotara ya pele ya selemo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligqugquzelwa ukuthi i-QLFS yokuqala yangowezi-2023 ibonise ukukhula ngekota okulandelanayo kwenani lemisebenzi kanye nokuqashwa kwabantu abayizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le United States (US).
tgt_text: 2 kusondela kancane kwinani eliyizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse hore dikamano tse pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le US ntse le tsa setswalle, tse matla mme di molemo bakeng sa dinaha ka bobedi ho latela seboka se neng se le dipakeng tsa Letona la Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisano, Ngaka Naledi Pandor le Lenqosa la US Afrika Borwa, Monghadi Reuben Brigety, ya boletseng hore Afrika Borwa fana ka dibetsa ho Russia.
tgt_text: 4 labantu abaqashwa ngaphambi kwezinsuku zokuhlasela kwegciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete boletse hape hore metjha ya bodiplomate thehilweng fumaneha dinaheng tsohle, ho kenyeletsa US, ho phahamisa ditaba tse ka hlahang taolong ya dikamano tsa dinaha tse pedi.
tgt_text: Lokhu kucacisa bha ukuthi umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika ululama ngokuqinile kwimiphumela yalolu bhubhane.

src_text: Kabinete amohela phatlalatso ya Cyril Ramaphosa ya ho thehwa ha patlisiso ikemetseng ho hlahloba diqoso tsa phano ya dibetsa tsa Afrika Borwa ho Russia.
Dintlha tsa patlisiso di tla phatlalatswa ka nako loketseng.
tgt_text: Izibalo zemisebenzi zekota yokuqala zibonisa imisebenzi eyizi-209 000 eyasungulwa kumkhakha ohlelekile kanye nemisebenzi eyizi-107 000 kumkhakha ongahlelekile ngesikhathi sekota yokuqala yonyaka..

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Singapore.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano beNingizimu Afrika ne-United States (i-US) .

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile amohela Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Rephabliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi la 16 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuqinisekisile ukuthi ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika ne-US busalokhu bubuhle, buqinile futhi womabili amazwe ayazuza kubona kulandela umhlangano phakathi kukaNgqongqoshe Wezobudlelwano Bamazwe Ngamazwe Nokubambisana, uDkt Naledi Pandor kanye neNxusa lase-US eliseNingizimu Afrika, uMnu Reuben Brigety, emva kwezinsolo zakhe zokuthi iNingizimu Afrika inikeze i-Russia izikhali..

src_text: Singapore ke motsetedi ya bohlokwa Afrika Borwa, ka letsete la dibilione tse fetang tse hlano tsa diranta ka kakaretso lefapheng le kang la tlhahiso, ditshebeletso tsa ditjhelete le thekiso ya matlo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lagcizelela ukuthi izindlela ezisunguliwe zokuxhumana zamanxusa azo zonke izizwe zikhona, kubandakanya i-US, ukuzwakalisa izinkinga uma ziqubuka ekuphathweni kobudlelwano phakathi kwala mazwe womabili..

src_text: Ditumellano tse saennweng dipakeng tsa dinaha tsena tse pedi di reretswe ho matlafatsa kgwebo, letsete, thuto le tshebedisano ya tshireletso..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele isimemezelo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa sokusungulwa kophenyo oluzimele oluzohlolisisa izinsolo zokuthi kwahanjiswa izikhali zisuka eNingizimu Afrika ziya e-Russia.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mohlala wa Ntlafatso ya Setereke (DDM) sa Kapa Bophirimela.
tgt_text: Imininingwane yalolu phenyo izomenyezelwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi..

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile isa DDM ya botshelela ya Imbizo ya Mopresidente Kapa Bophirimela, Masepaleng wa Lehae wa Drakenstein, Seterekeng sa Cape Winelands, ka Labohlano la 19 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano beNingizimu Afrika ne-Singapore.

src_text: Mopresidente ile etella pele moifo tswang mafapheng ohle mmuso mararo tlasa sehlooho se reng: “Le se ke la Siya Mang kapa Mang ka Morao”.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa usingathe uNgqongqoshe Wezwe u-Lee Hsien Loong weRiphabhulikhi yase-Singapore ngoLwesibili, mhla we-16 kuNhlaba..

src_text: Imbizo ne etelletswe pele ke ketelo ya Mopresidente sebakeng sa Ntlafatso ya Bodulo ba Batho Vlakkeland Catalytic haufi leng ntshetsopele ya matlo setjhaba kgolo ka ho fetisisa ho fihle jwale Masepaleng wa Lehae wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Izwe lase-Singapore lingabatshalizimali abakhulu eNingizimu Afrika, nasebetshale izimali zenani eliphelele elingaphezu kwezigidigidi ezi-R5 emikhakheni efana neyokukhiqiza, izinsizakalo zezimali kanye nokuthengiswa kwezindlu.

src_text: Ntlafatso tswetseng pele ka 2017 ha feela tla fana ka matlo 2 556 ho batho ba tshwanelehang..
tgt_text: Izivumelwano ezisayiniwe phakathi kwamazwe womabili zihlose ukuqinisa uhwebo, utshalomali, ezemfundo kanye nokubambisana kwezokuvikeleka.

src_text: Kaho ya matlo 942 Karolo ya Pele ntse tswela pele 454 se phethilwe mme 301 ntse hahwa.

Bohlokwa ba projeke ena ke hore haha mefuta fapaneng ya dikgetho tsa matlo ho tloha ho batho ba fumanang moputso wa R0 ho ya ho R3 500 (tlasa Ho Qetella Motheo Motjha), ho Lenaneo la Ditjhelete le Hokahaneng le Motho ka Mong, bakeng sa batho ba fumanang moputso pakeng tsa R3 501 le R22 000 ka selemo.
tgt_text: IMbizo kaMongameli yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM) eNtshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Monyetla wa Bodulo ba Setjhaba hammoho le wa Bahlabani ba Sesole teng projekeng ena.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa ubambe iMbizo kaMongameli ye-DDM yesithupha eNtshonalanga Kapa, kuMasipala Wendawo i-Drakenstein, kwiSifunda sase-Cape Winelands, ngoLwesihlanu ziyi-19 kuNhlaba..

src_text: Ketelo ya Bolebedi ya Mmasepala wa Motsemoholo wa eThekwini le Mmasepala wa Setereke sa uMgungundlovu ka la 18 le la 19 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: UMongameli uhole ithimba eliphuma kuzo zontathu izinhlaka zikahulumeni ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Asishiyi Muntu Ngemuva”.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Paul Mashatile ile buisana le batshehetsi ba amehang ho tsa thuto le thupello, temo, kgwebo le diindasteri nakong ya leeto la bookamedi Mmasepaleng wa Motsemoholo wa eThekwini le Mmasepaleng wa Setereke sa uMgungundlovu le karolo ya DDM ya ketelo ya bolebedi.
tgt_text: IMbizo yandulelwa uhambo lukaMongameli lokuvakashela lapho kwakhiwa khona indawo yokuhlalisa abantu eseduze i-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development, okuluhlelo olukhulu lokwakhiwa kwezindlu zomphakathi olwake lwaba khona kuze kube manje kuMasipala Wendawo i-Drakenstein.

src_text: Diprojeke tse ka sehloohong tse etetsweng ne le tsa sebaka sa Projeke ya Ntshongweni Catalytic, moo Smart City ntse ahwa pakeng tsa Durban le Pietermaritzburg.
tgt_text: Ukwakhiwa okwaqala ngowezi-2017 kuzothi kungaphothulwa bese kuhlinzeka ngezindlu eziyi-2 556 kulabo abafanelekile.

src_text: Projeke ena tla tsosolosa mosebetsi wa moruo sebakeng seo tla ba le tlatsetso ya diranta tse dibilione tse ka bang 15 tsa letsete dilemo tse latelang tse 10 ho isa ho tse.
Tsamaiso ya Phepelo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: Ukwakhiwa kwezindlu ezingama-942 kweSigaba Sokuqala kuyaqhubeka, okuyizindlu ezingama-454 eseziphothuliwe kanye nezingama-301 ezisakhiwa.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile etela Morero wa Metsi Dihlaba tsa Lesotho ka Labobedi la 23 Motsheanong 2023 leng moo ileng kenya letsoho moketeng wa ho fetola lekote la Mohato wa 2 wa projeke saennwe dilemong tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ile wa dieha, mokete ona ke pontsho ya ho potlakisa mohato wa dinaha tsena tse pedi.
tgt_text: Ukubaluleka kwalo mklamo ukuthi ubhekelela izinhlelo zezindlu ezehlukahlukene kusuka kulabo abahola i-R0 kuya kwizi-R3 500 (ngaphansi KoHlelo Oludidiyelwe Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu), kuya kulabo abasoHlelweni Lokuxhaswa Ngezimali Zokuthenga Indlu, labo abahola phakathi kwezi-R3 501 kuya kwizi-R22 000 ngenyanga.

src_text: Morero wa Metsi Dihlaba tsa Lesotho bohlokwa bakeng sa ho netefatsa polokeho ya phepelo ya metsi Gauteng, Foreistata, Mpumalanga, Leboya Bophirima le Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: Womabili amathuba Ezindlu Zomphakathi kanjalo namathuba ezindlu Zomakadebona Bezempi akhona kulo mklamo..

src_text: Letsete tsamaisong ya phepelo ya metsi bakeng sa ho ntlafatsa bophelo ba MaAfrika Borwa le ntse le tswela pele, ka phano ya diranta tse ka hodimo ho dibilione tse 14 ho bomasepala bakeng sa ho shebana le ditsamaiso tsa phepelo ya metsi tse saletseng morao, ka Thuso ya Infrastraktjha Kgolo ya Mabatowa Mangata (RBIG) le Thuso ya Infrastraktjha ya Ditshebeletso tsa Metsi (WSIG).
tgt_text: UHambo Lokuyohlola Umsebenzi kuMasipala Wedolobha laseThekwini kanye noMasipala Wesifunda saseMgungundlovu mhla we-18 nomhla we-19 kuNhlaba.

src_text: RBIG tla sebediswa diprojekeng tse 130 mme WSIG yona abelwe diprojeke tse fetang 400 ho phatlalla le naha.
tgt_text: IPhini likaMongameli u-Paul Mashatile uxoxisane nababambiqhaza kwezemfundo nokuqeqeshwa, ezolimo, ezentengiselwano kanye nezimboni ngesikhathi sohambo lokuyohlola umsebenzi kuMasipala Wedolobha laseThekwini kanye noMasipala Wesifunda saseMgungundlovu njengengxenye yokuhambela ukuhlola imisebenzi ye-DDM.

src_text: Kabinete boetse thabisitswe ke hore Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) le nka mehato ya ho lwantsha bobodu ka ho busetswa ha dimilione tse ka bang R600 ke dikhamphani tse unneng molemo ka ho fumana dithendara tse sa tlwaelehang.
tgt_text: Enye yemiklamo ehamba phambili evakashelwe kube yindawo okwakhiwa kuyona i-Ntshongweni Catalytic Project, lapho okwakhiwa khona iDolobha Lesimanjemanje phakathi kweTheku noMgungundlovu.

src_text: Kabinete boetse hokometse mehato ya taolo ya thibelo behilweng ke lefapha ho fedisa ditshenyehelo tse sa tlwaelehang, tse se nang ditholwana le tse se nang thuso.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo uzovuselela imisebenzi efukula umnotho endaweni, nokufaka igalelo lotshalomali olubiza izigidigidi ezi-R15 eminyakeni eyi-10 kuya kweyi-15 ezayo..

src_text: Kgau ya Tshireletso ya Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda yamanzi.

src_text: Afrika Borwa fumane Kgau ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Setjhaba (ISSA) le Ditlwaelo tse Ntle ya maemo ho Tshireletso ya Setjhaba bakeng sa Afrika 2023 elang hloko letsete la mmuso bophelong ba bana ba rona, haholo ba tswang malapeng futsanehileng le nang le mathata.
tgt_text: UMongameli U-Ramaphosa uvakashele umklamo i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-23 kuNhlaba 2023 lapho abe yingxenye womcimbi wokuphendulwa kwesoyi leSigaba Sesibili somklamo.

src_text: Tokelo ya ho kena ha Afrika Borwa bakeng sa kgau ena ya maemo ne na le sehlooho se reng: “Katoloso ya hanyane ka hanyane ya kakaretso ya tshireletso ho bana ba nang le mathata: Taba ya Krante ya Tlhokomelo ya Ngwana, Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo owasayinwa eminyakeni eminingi eyadlula futhi wabambezeleka, lo mcimbi ubonisa ukubaluleka kokusheshiswa kwalo msebenzi obalulekile wala mazwe womabili.

src_text: Kakaretso ya dikenyeletso tse 138 ile ya fumanwa ho tswa ho ditho tse 48 tsa mekgatlo tswang dinaheng tse fetang 30 tse Afrika.
tgt_text: Umklamo i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ubaluleke kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukutholakala kwamanzi e-Gauteng, eFreyistata, eMpumalanga, eNyakatho Ntshonalanga naseNyakatho Kapa..

src_text: Thuso ya rona ya setjhaba ke motheo wa mmuso wa leano la ho fedisa tlala mme ka sehlohong bakeng sa ho kgutlisa seriti sa batho ba habo rona.
tgt_text: Ukutshalwa kwezimali kwingqalasizinda yamanzi ukuze kuzothuthukiswa izimpilo zabantu baseNingizimu Afrika kuyaqhubeka njengoba kwatshelwe omasipala imali engaphezu kwezigidigidi ezi-R14 ukuthi babhekana nenkinga yokusilela emuva kwingqalasizinda yamanzi, ngokusebenzisa iSibonelelo Sengqalasizinda Yezifunda (i-RBIG) kanye neSibonelelo Sengqalasizinda Yezinsizakalo Zamanzi (i-WSIG).

src_text: Tsamaiso ya tshireletso ya Afrika Borwa hara tse kgolo ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng, mme na le baamohedi ba fetang dimilione tse.
tgt_text: I-RBIG izosetshenziswa kwimiklamo eyi-130 bese kuthi i-WSIG yona izofakwa kwimiklamo engama-400 kulolonke izwe..

tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde laziphawula izinyathelo zokulawula ezibekwe ngumnyango zokuqeda ukusetshenziswa kwezimali okungahambisani nomthetho, okungenasidingo nokumoshayo.

src_text: Kabinete thabisitswe ke hore Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete tsa mafapha mmuso di tswela pele hantle.
tgt_text: Indondo Yezokuvikeleka Komphakathi.

src_text: Sejule ya Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete tse latelang le tshehetso ya dipuisano tsa boraditaba:..
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ithole iNdondo Yomsebenzi Omuhle kwezoKuvikeleka Komphakathi e-Afrika ngowezi-2023 yeNhlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe Kwezokuvikeleka Komphakathi (i-ISSA), ebonisa ukubonga ukuzinikela kukahulumeni ezimpilweni zabantwana bethu, ikakhulukazi labo abaphuma emakhaya adla imbuya ngothi futhi abuthakathaka..

src_text: Ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023 ka 13:00, Letona la Tsamaiso ya Tshebedisano le Ditaba tsa Setso (CoGTA), Mofumahadi Thembi Nkadimeng tla tsamaisa puisano le boraditaba mabapi le Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete tsa CoGTA tla bontsha mehato reretsweng ho matlafatsa tshebetso ya bommasepala...
tgt_text: Isicelo sokungenela ukuthola le ndondo seNingizimu Afrika sasinesihloko esithi: “Ukwandiswa kancane kancane kokuvikeleka kwenhlalo yabantwana ababuthakathaka: Udaba lweSibonelelo Sabantwana, eNingizimu Afrika”.

src_text: Ka Labobedi la 30 Motsheanong 2023, Letona la Ntlafatso ya Setjhaba, Mofumahadi Lindiwe Zulu, le Letona la Toka le Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa, Monghadi Ronald Lamola, ba tla tshwara seboka sa Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete mme dintlha tsa puisano ya bona le boraditaba di tla fanwa ka nako loketseng..
tgt_text: Inani eliphelele lezicelo zokungenela ezamukelwa zazisuka ezikhungweni ezingamalungu ezingama-48 emazweni angaphezu kwama-30 e-Afrika..

src_text: Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete ya Mopresidente di tla tekwa ka Laboraro la 31 Motsheanong 2023, mme puisano le boraditaba mabapi le Kgatelopele ka Diphetoho tsa Moralo le Mehato ya Khiro ka kgokahano le Operation Vulindlela, di tla tshwarwa ka Labobedi la 30 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Izibonelelo zethu zomphakathi zingummongo wohlelo lukahulumeni lokuqeda ububha futhi zingumnyombo wokubuyisa isithunzi sabantu bakithi.

src_text: Sehopotso sa Dilemo tse 20 sa Letsatsi la Afrika le Tsela ya Tekolo ya Semphato ya Afrika (APRM).
tgt_text: Uhlelo lweNingizimu Afrika lokuvikela umphakathi luphakathi kwezinhlelo ezinkulukazi emhlabeni, njengoba lunabantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-18 abahlomula kulona.

src_text: Kabinete le maAfrika Borwa ohle ikopantse le kontinente ya Afrika le lefatshe lohle ho keteka Letsatsi la Afrika ka Labone la 25 Motsheanong.
Selemo sena se bohlokwa ka ho kgetheha kaha se tshwaya sehopotso sa bo-60 sa ho saenwa ha molao wa motheo wa Mokgatlo wa Kopano ya Afrika leng selelekela sa Kopano ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Amavoti Ezabelomali.

src_text: Mookotaba bakeng sa mekete ya 2023– “Ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Potlakiso ya Sebaka sa Kgwebo Lokolohileng Kontinenteng ya Afrika” – ho ela hloko mehato nkilweng bakeng sa ho kenya tshebetsong sebaka se seholo ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng sa tokoloho ya kgwebo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyathokoza ukuthi amaVoti Ezabelomali eminyango kahulumeni aqhubeka kahle.

src_text: Sehopotso sa Kgwedi ya Afrika sa selemong sena se dumellanang le sehopotso sa bo-20 sa APRM, se reretswe ho sebedisa taolo ntle ka hara kontinente ka thuto ya papiso hlophisitsweng le boitekolo
tgt_text: Uhlelo lwamaVoti Ezabelomali azayo kanye nezithangami zabezindaba:..

src_text: Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: NgoLwesihlanu mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023 ngehora le-13:00, uNgqongqoshe Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana Nezindaba Zendabuko (i-CoGTA), uNks Thembi Nkadimeng, uzobamba isithangami sabezindaba mayelana neVoti leSabelomali elizocacisa izinyathelo okuhloswe ngazo ukuqinisa ukusebenza komasipala.

src_text: Namakwa Special Economic Zone (SEZ).
Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana ho qollwa ha Namakwa SEZ Aggeneys, Kapa Leboya.
tgt_text: NgoLwesibili, mhla wama-30 kuNhlaba 2023, uNgqongqoshe Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi, uNks Lindiwe Zulu, kanye noNgqongqoshe Wezobulungiswa Nokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo, uMnu Ronald Lamola, bazoba namaVoti Ezabelomali kanti imininingwane yezithangami zabezindaba izokhishwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi...

src_text: Tlhahiso ya ho qolla etswa tumellanong le Molao wa Dibaka tse Kgethehileng tsa Moruo wa 2014 (Molao 16 wa 2014) mme SEZ sisintsweng, ke karolo ya Tshebetso ya Matsete ya Mopresidente.
tgt_text: IVoti Lesabelomali leHhovisi likaMongameli lizokwethulwa ngoLwesithathu, mhla wama-31 kuNhlaba 2023 kanti isithangami sabezindaba ngeNqubekelaphambili Yezinguquko Zezakhiwo kanye Nemizamo Yokusungula Imisebenzi ehlanganiswa ngohlelo lwe-Operation Vulindlela sizoba ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-30 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Namakwa SEZ tla ba senotlolo sa melemo ya morafo, tlhahiso ya hydrogen tala, ntlafatso ya infrastraktjha, eneji ka ntjhafatswang le tshebetso ya temo.
tgt_text: USuku Lwe-Afrika kanye nokubungaza iminyaka engama-20 yeNdlela Yokuhlolana Kwamazwe ase-Afrika (i-APRM).

src_text: Mafapha bohlokwa bakeng sa tlhahiso ya mosebetsi le ntlafatso ya moruo wa Kapa Leboya le naha..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi nabobonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bahlanganyele nezwekazi lase-Afrika nomhlaba wonke ukubungaza uSuku lwe-Afrika ngoLwesine, mhla wama-25 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Matsete fetang diranta tse dibilione tse 29 se ntse behetswe thoko bakeng sa mohato wa pele wa SEZ.
tgt_text: Lo nyaka ubalulekile ikakhulukazi njengoba uluphawu lokuphela kweminyaka engama-60 kwasayinwa isisekelo somqulu weNhlangano Yobumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika, eyandulela uBumbano Lwamazwe Ase-Afrika.

src_text: Ona kenyeletsa boitlamo ho tswa ho Vedanta Zinc (Diranta tse dibilione tse 16), Frontier Rare Earth (Diranta tse dibilione tse 13), Hive Energy (Diranta tse dimilione tse 200) le RRS Trade and Investment (Diranta tse dimilione tse 100)..
tgt_text: Isiqubulo semibungazo yangowezi-2023 esithi - “Ukusheshisa Ukuqaliswa Kokuhwebelana Ngaphandle Kokukhokha Intela Kwamazwe Asezwenikazini i-Afrika” – sibonisa amagxathu athathwayo ekuqaliseni ukusebenza kwale nkundla yokuhweba enkulukazi emhlabeni..

src_text: Kgatiso ya Boraro ya Leano la Mohlodi wa Metsi Setjhaba (NWRS-3).
tgt_text: Umbungazo weNyanga ye-Afrika wakulo nyaka uqondane nokuphela kweminyaka engama-20 ye-APRM, okuhloswe ngako ukuqinisa ukubusa kahle ezwenikazini ngokulandela izindlela zokuthi izwe lifunde kwelinye izwe futhi aphinde ahlolane wona

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana NWRS-3 ya 2023, bakeng sa phethahatso, mme leano lena ke le tlamang ho bolaodi bohle le mekgatlo ho kenya tshebetsong Molao wa Naha wa Metsi wa 1998 (Molao 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Leano lena le susumeditswe ke tlhahlobo ya dilemo tse tharo ya NWRS-2 qollotseng dibaka tsa katleho le dibaka tse ntseng di tobana le mathata..
tgt_text: INdawo Yomnotho Okhethekile (i-SEZ) e-Namakwa.

src_text: NWRS-3 na le merero meraro ya sehlooho leng ntlafatso ya metsi le bohlweki lokelang ho tshehetswa, ho fediswa ha tlala le ho se lekalekane, tlatsetso moruong le tlhahiso ya mosebetsi, mme metsi lokela ho sireletswa, ho sebediswa, ho ntlafatswa, ho hlokomelwa le ho laolwa ka tsela tsitsitseng le ka ho lekana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukubekwa kwe-SEZ e-Namakwa e-Aggeneys eNyakatho Kapa.

src_text: Leano lena le etsa ditshisinyo tse tshwarehang bakeng sa ho eketsa phepelo ya metsi, ho fokotsa tlhokeho ya metsi, taolo atlehang ya metsi le bohlweki, ho laola lefapha la metsi le bohlweki, ho aba metsi bakeng sa phetoho, ho kgothaletsa tshebedisano ya matjhaba, le ho laola metsi le bohloweki tlasa maemo lehodimo ntseng fetoha..
tgt_text: Lesi sethulo sokubekwa senziwe ngokwemigomo yoMthetho Wezindawo Zomnotho Okhethekile, wezi-2014 (uMthetho we-16 wezi-2014) futhi i-SEZ eyethuliwe iyingxenye yoMkhankaso KaMongameli Wotshalomali.

src_text: NWRS-3 phatlaladitswe websaeteng ya DWS ho www.dws.gov.za..
tgt_text: I-SEZ yase-Namakwa izovula amathuba okuhlomula ezimayini, ukukhiqizwa kwehayidrojini ehlanzekile, ukuthuthukiswa kwezingqalasizinda, ugesi ovuselelekayo kanye nokwenziwa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Mehato Kentsweng Tshebetsong ke Lefapha la Tshireletso (DoD) ho Sebetsana le Diketso le Boitshwaro ba Ditho tsa Sesole sa Naha sa Tshireletso sa Afrika Borwa (SANDF) tse Romelwang Mererong ya ho Boloka Kgotso.
tgt_text: Le mikhakha ibaluleke kakhulu ekusungulweni kwemisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukiswa komnotho waseNyakatho Kapa nowezwe.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho mabapi le kgatelopele eo Afrika Borwa e etsang ho sebetsana le boitshwaro ba ditho tse ding tsa SANDF tse rometsweng bakeng sa ho boloka kgotso ho phatlalla le kontinente.

SANDF se hlokometse mohlodi wa boikgantsho ba naha ha ntse kenya letsoho mererong ya ho boloka kgotso kontinenteng, bakeng sa tshireletso tsitsitseng le kgotso dinaheng tsa Afrika tse ruthuthilweng ke ntwa tse tlasa dithuso tsa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN)..
tgt_text: Lungaphezu kwezigidigidi ezingama-R29 utshalomali oseluvele luthenjisiwe esigabeni sokuqala se-SEZ.

src_text: Ka diqoso tsa ditlolo tsa thobalano tse amang masole bolokang kgotso tse qadileng ho hlahella ka 2015, Sehlopha sa Tshebetso sa Matona se ile sa thehwa ka 2019 bakeng sa ho etsa dipatlisiso ka diqoso tsa tlhekefetso ya peto le tlhekefetso (SEA) ka hare ho DoD..
tgt_text: Lokhu kubandakanya izithembiso eziphuma ku-Vedanta Zinc (izigidigidi eziyi-R16), e-Frontier Rare Earth (izigidigidi eziyi-R13), e-Hive Energy (izigidi ezingama-R200) kanye nase-RRS Trade and Investment (izigidi eziyi-R100)..

src_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditswe ke letoto la mehato kentsweng tshebetsong ya ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tsa SEA mererong ya ho boloka kgotso ya SANDF.
tgt_text: UShicilelo Lwesithathu Lweqhingasu Likazwelonke Lwezinsiza Zamanzi (i-NWRS-3) lwangowezi-.

src_text: UN nka Afrika Borwa na le ditlwaelo tse ntle ka ho fetisisa mme thoholeditse naha ka kgatelopele eo e entseng ya ho hlakola SEA ka hare ho SANDF.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze i-NWRS-3 yangowezi-2023 ukuthi iqaliswe futhi leli qhingasu liphoqa zonke iziphathimandla kanye nezikhungo ezisebenzisa uMthetho Kazwelonke Wamanzi, we-1998 (uMthetho wama-36 we-1998)..

src_text: Kabinete hatisitse hore ditlwaelo tsa SEA di ke ke tsa dumellwa ho senya tlaleho ntle ya SANDF kontinenteng..
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lakhiwe ngokubuyekezwa kweminyaka emithathu ye-NWRS-2, okuveze izindawo lapho kube nempumelelo khona kanye nezindawo ezisanenselele.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Batjha ya.
Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Batjha la 2023 tlasa mookotaba: “Ho potlakisa tokoloho ya moruo wa batjha bakeng sa bokamoso ba moshwelella”.
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 iqukethe izinhlosonqangi ezintathu, zokuthi ezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle kufanele zeseke ukuthuthukiswa, ukuqedwa kobubha nokungalingani, zifake igalelo emnothweni nasekusungulweni kwemisebenzi, futhi amanzi kufanele avikelwe, asetshenziswe, athuthukiswe, aphathwe futhi alawulwe ngokusimeme nangokulingana..

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Mashatile tla beha puo Letsatsing la Setjhaba leo selemong sena le tla ketekwa ka matsatsi mabedi ho tloha ka la 16 ho isa ho la 17 Phuptjane 2023, Setsing sa Dipapadi sa Mangaung, Bloemfontein, Foreistata.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lenza izethulo ezibambekayo zokukhushulwa kokuthunyelwa kwamanzi, ukunciphisa ukudingeka kwamanzi, ukuphathwa ngendlela kwamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle, ukubekwa kwezinqubomgomo emkhakheni wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle, ukuphakwa kwamanzi ukuze kuzokwenzeka izinguquko, ukugqugquzela ukubambisana kwamazwe ngamazwe, kanye nokuphathwa kwamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle ngaphansi kwesimo sezulu esiguquguqukayo.

src_text: Matsatsing ao mabedi, ho tla ba le monyetla wa hore batjha ba nke karolo puisanong le Matona, Batlatsi ba Matona le baamehi ba bang ho dithupello tse fapafapaneng, menyetla ya kgwebo le ntlafatso fumanehang ka hara mmuso le balekane ba setjhaba..

Kgwedi ya Batjha tla thakgolwa ka Labone la 1 Phuptjane ke Letona la Kantoro ya Mopresidente wa Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba Nang le Boqhwala, ke Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma le Hector Pieterson Memorial le Musiamong wa Soweto..
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 ishicilelwe kwiwebhusayithi yase-DWS ethi: www.dws.gov.za..

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho baahi hore ba matlafatse boiteko ba ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fumana menyetla tla ba dumella ho ba le seabo moruong.
tgt_text: Umbiko ngezinyathelo eziqaliswe nguMnyango Wezokuvikeleka (i-DoD) ukubhekana nendlela yokuziphatha kwamalungu oMbutho Wezokuvikeleka Kuzwelonke eNingizimu Afrika (i-SANDF) atshalwe kwimisebenzi yokuletha ukuthula.

src_text: Mmuso, jwaloka mohiri ya itlhommeng pele arabetse tlhokong ya ntlafatso ya bokgoni le khiro ya batjha ka ho dumella ho hirwa ha baithuti ba sa sebetseng hore ba fumane boiphihlelo ho Lenaneo la Boithuti la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso.
Mmuso boetse kentse tshebetsong Letlole la Khiro ya Setjhaba (SEF) mme wa tsosolosa boiteko ba tlhahiso ya mesebetsi ya Tshebeletso ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) hulelang dikete tsa batjha ho tsa moruo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithole umbiko ngenqubekelaphambili eyenziwa iNingizimu Afrika ekubhekaneni nendlela yokuziphatha kwamanye amalungu e-SANDF atshalwe kwimisebenzi yokugcina ukuthula kulolonke izwekazi.

src_text: Kenello ya Mopresidente Khirong ya Batjha se ntse atlehile ho tshehetsa ho fumaneha ha menyetla dimilione tse.
tgt_text: I-SANDF ibilokhu ingumthombo wokuzigqaja kwesizwe njengoba iyingxenye yemisebenzi yokugcina ukuthula ezwenikazini eletha uzinzo nokuthula ezizweni zase-Afrika ezibambene ngempi ngosizo lweZizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN)..

src_text: 5 ya meputso ya nakwana, milione le nngwe ya dibaka tse thehilweng mosebetsing, menyetla 250 000 ya thuto kopantseng mosebetsi, menyetla 250 000 ya ditshebeletso tse lefang mme batjha ba 500 000 ba tshwarehile ka mesebetsi fanang ka moputso.
tgt_text: Mayelana nezinsolo zamacala ezocansi abandakanya abagcini bokuthula bombutho wezokuvikeleka ezaqubuka ngowezi-2015, iThimba loNgqongqoshe lasungulwa ngowezi-2019 ukuze lizophenyisisa amacala okuxhashazwa nokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi (i-SEA) ngaphakathi e-DoD.

src_text: Ha ntse re kena Kgweding ya Batjha, mmuso hopotsa batjha ho ingodisa ho SAYouth.mobi kaha batjha ba bang ba dimilione tse nne ba se ba ntse ba ingodisitse, moo menyetla ya mosebetsi ka fihlellwang.

tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithokozile ngeqoqo lezinyathelo ezibekiwe ukubhekana nezehlakalo ze-SEA kwimisebenzi ye-SANDF yokugcina ukuthula.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse hore Afrika Borwa be motsamaisi mmoho wa Seboka sa FARA sa bo-8 sa Kgwebo ya Temo le Beke ya Saense Afrika hammoho le Seboka sa sona sa Kakaretso sa bo-9 Durban ho tloha ka la 5 ho ya ho la 9 Phuptjane..
tgt_text: I-UN iyayibonga iNingizimu Afrika ngokwenza kahle futhi yancoma leli lizwe ngenqubekelaphambili eliyenzile ngokuqeda i-SEA kwi-SANDF..

src_text: FARA ke mokgatlo hlophisitsweng wa dikontinente ikarabellang ka ho thusa le ho hokahanya patlisiso ya temo le kgatelopele ya boqapi kontinenteng..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligcizelele ukuthi izenzo ze-SEA ngeke zimukeleke ukudicilela phansi umlando omuhle we-SANDF ezwenikazini.

src_text: Ka ho tsamaisa ketsahalo ena, Afrika Borwa tla rua molemo ka tshebedisano mmoho le dikamano le mekgatlo ya kontinente ya temo le patlisiso, ka ho arolelana ditlwaelo tsa saense ya temo le patlisiso.

Afrika Borwa nka patlisiso ya temo bakeng sa ntlafatso le bohlokwa, haholo ho nahannwe ka phetoho maemong lehodimo le dintlha tse ding tse amang bokgoni ba naha ba ho finyella kanetso ya dijo, ntlafatso ya moruo le khiro.
tgt_text: INyanga Yentsha yangowezi-.

src_text: Seboka se lebeletswe ho kgahla baeti ba 800 KwaZulu-Natal le Gauteng, mme sena se tla tlatsetsa ho tshebetso ya moruo..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlelo Lwenyanga Yentsha lwangowezi-2023 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ukusheshisa Ukukhululwa Komnotho Wentsha Ukuze Izoba Nekusasa Elisimeme”.

src_text: Ditaba tsa kgwebo.
Kabinete amohetse tlaleho bontshang ntlafalo kgwebong ya naha ya lenaneo la thomello ya thepa.
tgt_text: IPhini likaMongameli u-Mashatile uzokwethula inkulumo yoSuku Lukazwelonke kulo nyaka oluzobe lugujwa ngezinsuku ezimbili kusuka mhla we-16 kuya mhla we-17 kuNhlangulana 2023 e-Mangaung Outdoor Sport Centre, e-Mangaung, e-Bloemfontein, eFreyistata.

src_text: Tlaleho eo bontshitse ha Afrika Borwa rometse thepa ya boleng ba diranta tse dibilione di 300 ka 2022 ho leba dinaheng tse 12 boloka mesebetsi tobileng akanyetswang ho 57
